short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automated trading on Charles Schwab. Execute same trade on all your accounts. Not financial advice. See full disclaimer.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SchwaBot is a Chrome extension designed for Charles Schwab investment account holders who want to streamline their trading process across multiple accounts. This tool allows you to execute the same trade simultaneously on all your Schwab brokerage accounts with just a few clicks, saving you valuable time and ensuring consistency in your investment strategy. The extension integrates seamlessly with Schwab's trading platform, providing an intuitive interface for inputting trade details such as ticker symbol, quantity, and buy/sell action. While SchwaBot offers convenience and efficiency, it's important to note that it facilitates automated trading, which carries inherent risks. Users should exercise caution, thoroughly understand their investment strategy, and be aware of the potential for rapid execution of trades across all linked accounts. SchwaBot is not a financial advisor and does not provide investment advice; it's a tool for executing your own informed decisions more efficiently. We strongly encourage users to review our full disclaimer and terms of use before installing and using this extension.
